c:simple-property.name: user
c:simple-property.description: User name if http endpoint requires authentication.

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: Password if http endpoint requires authentication.

c:simple-property.name: realm
c:simple-property.description: Authentication Realm. By default user name and password will be used with any realm.

c:simple-property.name: followRedirects
c:simple-property.description: Follow http redirects when contacting endpoints?

c:simple-property.name: validateResponseCode
c:simple-property.description: Set this to true if response code should determine availability. Codes in the 200-299 range are considered success.

c:simple-property.name: validateResponsePattern
c:simple-property.description: If not empty, availability will depend on http response having content matching this (Java style) regular expression.
